name: Computer Shop Sim
description:
Computer Shop Simulator is a game all about running your own computer / hardware shop. You need to fix computers, buy parts, assemble computers and sell them on to make a profit in a world of broken computers.

Available currently as of the second Alpha (v0.2.10.1):

  • Fix computers riddled with viruses with professional antivirus software.
  • Fix broken computer parts inside of old or expensive computers!
  • Multi-task on multiple computers - try and get your bearings against time!
  • Bonjour! Hallo! Hello! Multiple Language support.
  • Swap out CPUs and replace the broken ones!
  • Blue Screens of Death!
  • Multiple Operating Systems to fix.
  • Careers! Build up your own business!

Planned to be added for the next major Alpha (v0.3.0):

  • More advanced part switching.

Please leave any more suggestions below.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS: (720p, low, 30fps)
CPU: Intel Celeron Class / AMD A4 Equivalent
GPU: A GPU capable of DX10/11 (Integrated will work!)
RAM: 4GB
HDD: 1GB of free space
OS: Windows Vista 32-bit
A keyboard and a mouse OR a Xbox One/360 Controller

RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS: (1080p, ultra, 60fps)
CPU: Intel Core i3-4160 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 OR higher
GPU: GeForce GTX 760 / AMD R9 280X OR higher
RAM: 4GB OR higher
HDD: 1GB of free space
OS: Windows 7 64-bit OR higher
A keyboard and a mouse OR a Xbox One/360 Controller
